itemDescription: first female commander of all-male British Army squadron

wikipedia_page.main: Judith Webb is a former Major in the British Army and a proponent of equal physical standards for male and female service members. She appeared on the BBC 100 Women list for 2013 and 2014. She was the first woman to command an otherwise all-male squadron of the British Army.
